meeting_info.organization: Quality of Life, Arts, and Culture Committee
meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, Texas

presenters: Luis Loya, Management Analyst, City Manager’s Office
Martine Elyse Philippe, Director, Office of Arts and Culture
Sallie Lockhart, Assistant Director, Dallas Public Library
Jessica Galleshaw, Director, Office of Community Care and Empowerment
Mary Martin, Assistant Director, Dallas Animal Services
Clifton Gillespie, Director, Department of Sanitation Services
James Walton, Assistant Director, Department of Transportation and Public Works
Candice Bryant, Manager of Transportation and Regulation, Department of Transportation and Public Works
Israel Herrera, Police Deputy Chief, Dallas Police Department
Dr. Lindsey Wilson, Director, Office of Equity and Inclusion
Christina Da Silva, Assistant Director, Office of Equity and Inclusion

agenda_items.title: Approval of the December 3, 2024, Quality of Life, Arts, and Culture Committee Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: 2024 Department Highlights and Quality of Life, Arts, and Culture Committee Feedback
agenda_items.description: Presentation of department highlights and feedback from the committee.

agenda_items.title: Dallas Public Art Program Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the Dallas Public Art Program and upcoming projects.

agenda_items.title: Office of Arts and Culture - FY 2025-26 Cultural Organizations Program Guidelines
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the guidelines for the Cultural Organizations Program.

agenda_items.title: Resident Vehicle Towing Practices
agenda_items.description: Overview of vehicle towing practices in Dallas.

agenda_items.title: Acceptance of NLC FY25 Cities Addressing Fines and Fees Equitably (CAFFE) Initiative Grant
agenda_items.description: Consideration of acceptance of grant funding for addressing fines and fees.

agenda_items.title: Quality of Life, Arts, and Culture Committee Forecast
agenda_items.description: Forecast of upcoming agenda items for the committee.
